test_case_name: Retry Delay Extraction - Gemini Rate Limit
test_steps:
1. Trigger Gemini API rate limit error
2. Extract retry delay from error
3. Verify retryDelay value extracted correctly
expected_result: Retry delay extracted from rate limit error response

test_case_name: Rate Limit Error Handling - Response Format
test_steps:
1. Trigger rate limit error
2. Verify error response contains retryDelay and isRateLimit fields
3. Verify retryDelay is number
expected_result: Error response includes retryDelay (number) and isRateLimit (boolean)
